title: Design and Implement VNet and CNI Networking
description: Define Terraform modules for Virtual Network, Subnets, and Network Security Groups tailored for Azure CNI to prevent IP exhaustion.
acceptance_criteria: VNet created; Subnets segmented; TF plan validates
definition_of_done: Terraform applied in dev; Connectivity verified

title: Provision AKS Cluster and Node Pools
description: Write Terraform to instantiate AKS with System and User node pools, enabling Cluster Autoscaler and RBAC.
acceptance_criteria: Cluster provisioned; Node pools separated; RBAC enabled

title: Terraform PostgreSQL Flexible Server with HA
description: Define PostgreSQL Flexible Server resource with High Availability (Zone Redundant) and Private Endpoint integration.
acceptance_criteria: Private Postgres server created; HA enabled; Connectivity verified

title: Define User Attributes and Claims Schema
description: Map user attributes (role, tenantId, permissions) to B2C claims and configure TrustFrameworkBase.xml.
definition_of_done: B2C accepts policy upload without errors

title: Implement Local Account Sign-Up/Sign-In Policy
description: Create SignUpOrSignin.xml policy with support for email verification and custom claim injection.
definition_of_done: JWT decoded successfully with correct claims

title: Implement Passport JWT Strategy
description: Create NestJS Passport strategy to validate JWT signature using JWKS from Azure B2C.
definition_of_done: Unit tests passing with mock tokens

title: Setup PostGIS and Define Service Area Schema
description: Enable PostGIS extension. Create TypeORM entity for ServiceCenterArea with Polygon geometry type.

title: Implement Point-in-Polygon Query Logic
description: Develop service method to query ServiceCenterAreas containing a given latitude/longitude using ST_Contains.
acceptance_criteria: Query returns correct service center; <100ms execution
definition_of_done: Integration tests passing with seed data

title: Implement File Upload Endpoint
description: Create NestJS endpoint to handle multipart file upload, validate mime-type/size, and upload to Azure Blob Storage.
acceptance_criteria: File in Blob Storage; Secure URL returned

title: Integrate Azure AI Document Intelligence
description: Implement service to call Azure OCR API with document URL. Define DTOs for response parsing.
acceptance_criteria: OCR API called; Response parsed; Error handling
definition_of_done: Successfully extracts date/total from sample invoice

title: Integrate Background Geolocation Library
description: Configure 'react-native-background-geolocation' for iOS/Android. Handle permissions and background modes.
definition_of_done: Verified on physical iOS and Android devices
testing_requirements: Battery drain test; Background execution test

title: WebSocket Client Integration for Location
description: Connect mobile app to Backend WebSocket Gateway to stream location updates in real-time.
acceptance_criteria: Secure WS connection; Location events emitted
